evidence_in_dialogue: [[Catherine]] maybe you can explain why the pledge who swallowed this key ended up dead
[[Warrick]] those black trilobal fibers that we found on debby reston 's body were from a chevy
[[Grissom]] this is where he brought them
[[Nick]] the partial vin number on our van 's a match
[[Sara]] the prints on the comb bindings from the comic books are a match to the prints recovered from the van and the garbagebag that debby reston was in
[[Brass]] kevin greer... works at the copy union
